article_title: More wounded Palestinians tell BBC the Israeli army forced them on to jeep
sentence: During  an  Israeli  operation  this  week,  bombs  buried  deep  in  the  roads  around  the  camp  hit  two  units  as  they  came  in  –  killing  one  soldier  and  wounding  16  others.
